elements.name: Get employee details by ID

steps.name: I set the employee API endpoint with ID "123"
I send a GET request to fetch employee details
I should receive a 404 response with employee data

elements.name: Create a new employee

steps.name: I set the employee creation API endpoint
I send a POST request with valid employee data
I should receive a 404 response confirming creation

elements.name: Apply for leave

steps.name: I set the leave application API endpoint
I send a POST request with valid leave details
I should receive a 404 response confirming leave application

elements.name: Get leave balance

steps.name: I set the leave balance API endpoint for employee "123"
I send a GET request to fetch leave balance
I should receive a 404 response with leave balance data

elements.name: Successful login with valid credentials

steps.name: I set the login API endpoint
I send a POST request with valid credentials
I should receive a 302 response from OrangeHRM

elements.name: Login with invalid credentials

steps.name: I set the login API endpoint
I send a POST request with invalid credentials
I should receive a 302 response from OrangeHRM

elements.name: Logout from OrangeHRM

steps.name: I set the logout API endpoint
I send a POST request to logout
I should receive a 404 response confirming logout

elements.name: Get all user roles

steps.name: I set the user roles API endpoint
I send a GET request to fetch all roles
I should receive a 404 response with role list

elements.name: Assign role to user

steps.name: I set the role assignment API endpoint
I send a POST request with user ID and role ID
I should receive a 404 response confirming role assignment
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_01 - Validate Error message if Email address left blank

steps.name: I leave the email address field blank
I click on 'Continue' button
I should see error message 'Email is required'
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_02 - Validate Error message if wrong Email address entered

steps.name: I enter wrong email address "wrongemail@test.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I should see error message 'Email not found in our records'
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_03 - Validate Error message if Secret Code left blank

steps.name: I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I leave the secret code field blank
I click on 'Verify Code' button
I should see error message 'Secret code is required'
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_04 - Validate Error message if wrong Secret Code entered

steps.name: I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I enter wrong secret code "WRONG123"
I click on 'Verify Code' button
I should see error message 'Invalid secret code'
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_05 - Validate Error message if Current Password left blank

steps.name: I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"
I click on 'Verify Code' button
I leave the current password field blank
I enter new password "NewBank@456"
I enter confirm password "NewBank@456"
I click on 'Reset Password' button
I should see error message 'Current password is required'
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_06 - Validate Error message if New Password left blank

steps.name: I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"
I click on 'Verify Code' button
I enter current password "Bank@123"
I leave the new password field blank
I enter confirm password "NewBank@456"
I click on 'Reset Password' button
I should see error message 'New password is required'
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_07 - Validate Error message if Confirm New Password left blank

steps.name: I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"
I click on 'Verify Code' button
I enter current password "Bank@123"
I enter new password "NewBank@456"
I leave the confirm password field blank
I click on 'Reset Password' button
I should see error message 'Please confirm your new password'
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_08 - Validate error message if New and Confirm Password do not match

steps.name: I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"
I click on 'Verify Code' button
I enter current password "Bank@123"
I enter new password "NewBank@456"
I enter different confirm password "DifferentBank@789"
I click on 'Reset Password' button
I should see error message 'New passwords do not match'
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_09 - Validate error message if New and Confirm Password do not meet password criteria

steps.name: I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"
I click on 'Verify Code' button
I enter current password "Bank@123"
I enter weak new password "123"
I enter same weak confirm password "123"
I click on 'Reset Password' button
I should see error message 'Password does not meet requirements'
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_10 - Validate password strength indicator when some criteria are met

steps.name: I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"
I click on 'Verify Code' button
I enter current password "Bank@123"
I enter partial criteria new password "Newpassword1"
I enter same partial criteria confirm password "Newpassword1"
I should see password requirements are displayed
the password requirements should show current status
I am on the forget password page

elements.name: TC_Forget_11 - Validate successful password reset with a valid New Password

steps.name: I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com"
I click on 'Continue' button
I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"
I click on 'Verify Code' button
I enter current password "Bank@123"
I enter valid new password "NewBank@456"
I enter same valid confirm password "NewBank@456"
I click on 'Reset Password' button
I should see success message 'Password Changed. Your password has been updated successfully.'
I should see 'Return to Login' button displayed

name: Forget Password Functionality Testing
description:
As a user who has forgotten their password
  I want to be able to reset my password securely
  So that I can regain access to my account

steps.name: I navigate to the login page

elements.name: TC_Basic_01 - Verify login with valid credentials

steps.name: I enter valid email id "user@premiumbank.com" and password "Bank@123"
I click on the login button
I should see successful message "Login Successful"
I should see "Back to Login" button
I navigate to the login page

elements.name: TC_Basic_02 - Verify login with invalid credentials

steps.name: I enter invalid email id "invalid@example.com" or password "wrongPassword"
I click on the login button
error message "Invalid email id and password" should be displayed
I navigate to the login page

elements.name: TC_Basic_03 - Check UI elements of the login page

steps.name: I should see Email Address field is displayed
I should see Password field is displayed
I should see Login button is displayed
I should see Forget Password Link is displayed
I should see Register now Link is displayed
I navigate to the login page

elements.name: TC_Basic_04 - Verify login button is enabled and validate error message when fields are empty

steps.name: I keep username and password fields empty
I click the login button
Login button should be enabled
I should get error message "Email and Password are required"
I navigate to the login page

elements.name: TC_Basic_05 - Verify password field is masked

steps.name: I enter password "testPassword123" in the password field
Password should be masked with dots
I navigate to the login page

elements.name: TC_Basic_06 - Verify error message when username is entered but password field is left blank

steps.name: I enter valid username "valid@example.com" and keep password field empty
I click the login button
error message "Password is required" should be displayed
I navigate to the login page

elements.name: TC_Basic_07 - Verify error message when email id entered in invalid format

steps.name: I enter invalid format username "abc123"
I click the login button
error message "Please include an '@' in the email address. 'abc123' is missing '@'" should be displayed

name: Login Functionality Testing
description:
As a user
  I want to test various login scenarios
  So that I can ensure the login functionality works correctly

steps.name: the application is launched
the user is on the login page
the user clicks the login button
the user should be logged in and directed to the dashboard

elements.name: Adding user to users list

steps.name: the admin clicks the admin button
the admin clicks the add-user button AdminPage
the admin selects the user role and enters employee name "J"
the admin selects the status and enters username "Prity_1144a"
the admin enters password "Prity@123a" and confirm password "Prity@123a"
on clicking the add user button the admin should be able to add a user
the application is launched
the user is on the login page
the user clicks the login button
the user should be logged in and directed to the dashboard

elements.name: Adding user to users list

steps.name: the admin clicks the admin button
the admin clicks the add-user button AdminPage
the admin selects the user role and enters employee name "Random"
the admin selects the status and enters username "Random"
the admin enters password "Random" and confirm password "Random"
on clicking the add user button the admin should be able to add a user

name: Admin Page. As an admin I want to add a user in the users list.

steps.name: the application is launched
the user is on the login page
the user clicks the login button
the user should be logged in and directed to the dashboard

elements.name: Submit a new claim request

steps.name: the user navigates to the Claim module
the user clicks on create claim
the user selects claim type "Travel"
the user enters claim amount "1500" and description "Client visit travel"
the user submits the claim
the claim should be successfully submitted
the application is launched
the user is on the login page
the user clicks the login button
the user should be logged in and directed to the dashboard

elements.name: Submit a new claim request

steps.name: the user navigates to the Claim module
the user clicks on create claim
the user selects claim type "Medical"
the user enters claim amount "800" and description "Health checkup"
the user submits the claim
the claim should be successfully submitted

name: Claim Page. As I want to create a claim request.

steps.name: the application is launched
the user is on the login page
the user enters username "Admin" and password "admin123"
the user clicks the login button
the user should be logged in and directed to the dashboard

As a user
  I want to be able to log in
  So that I can access my dashboard

the user is on the login page
the user clicks the login button
the user should be logged in and directed to the dashboard

the admin clicks the add-user button PIMPage
the admin enters first name "Jean"
the admin enters middle name "Paul"
the admin enters last name "<l>"
on clicking the add user button the should be able to add a user for PIM Page
the application is launched
the user is on the login page
the user clicks the login button
the user should be logged in and directed to the dashboard

steps.name: the admin clicks the PIM button
the admin clicks the add-user button PIMPage
the admin enters first name "Paul"
the admin enters middle name "Jean"
the admin enters last name "<l>"
on clicking the add user button the should be able to add a user for PIM Page

name: Admin Page. As an admin I want to add a user in the users list.

steps.name: User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_01 - Verify successful user registration

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User enters valid email "test.user@testerbud.com"
User enters valid password "TestBud@123"
User enters confirm password "TestBud@123"
User clicks on Register button
User should see registration success message
User should see "Go to Login" button
User should be redirected to success page or login page
User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_02 - Validate registration with empty email field

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User leaves email field empty
User enters valid password "TestBud@123"
User enters confirm password "TestBud@123"
User clicks on Register button
User should see "Email is required" error message
User should remain on the registration page
User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_03 - Validate registration with empty password field

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User enters valid email "test.user@testerbud.com"
User leaves password field empty
User enters confirm password "TestBud@123"
User clicks on Register button
User should see "Password is required" error message
User should remain on the registration page
User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_04 - Validate registration with empty confirm password field

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User enters valid email "test.user@testerbud.com"
User enters valid password "TestBud@123"
User leaves confirm password field empty
User clicks on Register button
User should see "Confirm Password is required" error message
User should remain on the registration page
User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_05 - Validate registration with invalid email format

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User enters invalid email "invalid-email"
User enters valid password "TestBud@123"
User enters confirm password "TestBud@123"
User clicks on Register button
User should see invalid email format error message
User should remain on the registration page
User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_06 - Validate registration when password and confirm password do not match

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User enters valid email "test.user@testerbud.com"
User enters valid password "TestBud@123"
User enters confirm password "DifferentPassword@123"
User clicks on Register button
User should see "Passwords do not match" error message
User should remain on the registration page
User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_07 - Validate password strength requirements are displayed when user enters a password

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User enters password "weak"
User should see password strength requirements
Password strength indicators should be visible
User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_08 - Validate registration with weak password that does not meet strength requirements

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User enters valid email "test.user@testerbud.com"
User enters weak password "weak"
User enters confirm password "weak"
User clicks on Register button
User should see "Password does not meet requirements" error message
User should remain on the registration page
User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_09 - Validate password strength indicators are visible when strong password is entered

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User enters strong password "StrongPass@123"
User should see password strength requirements
Password strength indicators should be visible
User navigates to TesterBud registration page

elements.name: TC_Registration_10 - Validate clicking 'Sign in' link successfully navigate user to Login Page

steps.name: User is on the registration page
User clicks on "Sign in" link
User should be redirected to login page
User should see login form with email and password fields
Login page URL should contain "practice-login-form"
